title: Opacity(OPCT) - Low Cap Storage Coin with a good dev team and a big potential to grow.
body:
Opacity (OPCT)
LOW CAP!
Instead of file coin there is a lot of room to grow! See at the bottom!

Opacity is a cloud storage provider with one major difference, privacy.

### Technical details

- **Token Name:** [Opacity (OPCT)]
- **Token Address: 0xDb05EA0877A2622883941b939f0bb11d1ac7c400
- **Token Type:** [Token]
- **Token Chain** [ERC-20, & Polygon bridge]
- **Stage:** [Launched]
- **Link to the whitepaper:** https://help.opacity.io/help/opacity-galaxy-whitepaper
- **Team doxxed:** [Yes]
- **Coinmarketcap:** https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/opacity/
- **Website:** https://www.opacity.io/
- **Telegramgroup:** https://telegram.me/opacitystorage

### Functional details

With the rise of digital property, many people have increasingly become concerned with the security and privacy of materials stored with cloud storage companies such as Dropbox, Google, and others. Small businesses, individuals, and enterprises want to keep their data private.

Opacity protects people’s basic rights and provides private cloud storage to anyone through its Opacity token, OPCT. The token can be purchased on a crypto exchange and then used to purchase data storage plans that are completely private, and can only be accessed by the purchaser with the private key.

Unlike other service providers, Opacity does not require personal identification information. Opacity stores no information on its users, and allows people to store private information, such as company secrets, intellectual property, personal photographs, legal documents, and family moments, with assurance that personal data stays personal.

Access to private storage and file sharing enables a new way to protect your important files. Storing and sharing files has limitless potential, covering a wide variety of areas:

    Photos
    Videos
    Music
    Banking documents
    Legal documents
    File sharing with coworkers
    Enterprise cold storage

Files can be shared privately or publicly, you decide!

## Fund allocation and personal opinion

Compare to this project to their competitors, this coin is still very undervalued. There is still a lot of room to grow. For a while I follow this project and the dev team are consistent and their making a great job. Their have a great working product(better and more user friendly then their competitors), lot of things coming out soon, mobile app, siacoin integration and more and more…

In my opinion long and short term investment could be both beneficial!

!!Room of possible grow!!:
